name: @bitwarden/desktop
description: A secure and free password manager for all of your devices.
author: Bitwarden Inc. <hello@bitwarden.com> (https://bitwarden.com)

scripts.build: concurrently -n Main,Rend,Prel -c yellow,cyan "npm run build:main" "npm run build:renderer" "npm run build:preload"
scripts.build:dev: concurrently -n Main,Rend,Prel -c yellow,cyan "npm run build:main:dev" "npm run build:renderer:dev" "npm run build:preload:dev"
scripts.build:main:dev: npm run build-native && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.main.js
scripts.build:main:watch: npm run build-native && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.main.js --watch
scripts.pack:lin:flatpak: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --dir -p never && flatpak-builder  --repo=build/.repo build/.flatpak  ./resources/com.bitwarden.desktop.devel.yaml --install-deps-from=flathub --force-clean &&  flatpak build-bundle ./build/.repo/ ./dist/com.bitwarden.desktop.flatpak com.bitwarden.desktop
scripts.pack:lin: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p never && export SNAP_FILE=$(realpath ./dist/bitwarden_*.snap) && unsquashfs -d ./dist/tmp-snap/ $SNAP_FILE && mkdir -p ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/ && cp ./resources/com.bitwarden.desktop.policy  ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/polkit.com.bitwarden.desktop.policy && rm $SNAP_FILE && snap pack --compression=lzo ./dist/tmp-snap/ && mv ./*.snap ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/tmp-snap/
scripts.pack:lin:arm64: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --dir -p never && tar -czvf ./dist/bitwarden_desktop_arm64.tar.gz -C ./dist/linux-arm64-unpacked/ .
scripts.pack:mac:with-extension: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:macos-extension:mac && electron-builder --mac --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:mas: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac mas --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:mas:with-extension: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:macos-extension:mas && electron-builder --mac mas --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:masdev: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac mas-dev --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:masdev:with-extension: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:macos-extension:masdev && electron-builder --mac mas-dev --universal -p never
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p never -c.win.signtoolOptions.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.dist:dir: npm run build && npm run pack:dir
scripts.dist:lin: npm run build && npm run pack:lin
scripts.dist:lin:arm64: npm run build && npm run pack:lin:arm64
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && npm run pack:mac
scripts.dist:mac:with-extension: npm run build && npm run pack:mac:with-extension
scripts.dist:mac:mas: npm run build && npm run pack:mac:mas
scripts.dist:mac:mas:with-extension: npm run build && npm run pack:mac:mas:with-extension
scripts.dist:mac:masdev: npm run build:dev && npm run pack:mac:masdev
scripts.dist:mac:masdev:with-extension: npm run build:dev && npm run pack:mac:masdev:with-extension
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && npm run pack:win
scripts.dist:win:ci: npm run build && npm run pack:win:ci
scripts.publish:lin: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p always
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac -p always
scripts.publish:mac:mas: npm run dist:mac:mas && npm run upload:mas
scripts.publish:win: npm run build && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always -c.win.signtoolOptions.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.publish:win:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always
